lg.l: prathamaṃ bhāvayen mantrī dvitīyaṃ karuṇāṃ vibhāvayet |
tasmāt punar api śūnyatābodhi dvitīyaṃ bījasaṃgrahaḥ |

prathamaṃ bhāvayen mṛ
takaṃ dharmmadhātvātmakaṃ viduḥ |
athavā nīlāruṇābhañ ca bhāvayet śraddhayā khalu |

gaurī mṛga
lāñchanaṃ dhatte | caurī mārttaṇḍabhājanaṃ |
vettālī vārihastā ca bhaisajyaṃ dhatte ghasmarī |
pukkasī vajrahastā ca sabarī rasadharī tathā |
caṇḍālī ḍamarukaṃ vādayet | etābhiḥ pūjyate prabhuḥ |
sa eva satvam ity āhuḥ paramānandasvabhāvakaṃ
cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhā ca haste rucakañ ca mekhalaṃ |

vāme vajrakapālañ ca khaṭvāṅgañ cāpi vā
mataḥ |

div.p:
caturbhujaṃ
caturmmāraṃ nirjjitaviśuddhiḥ | pūrvvoktavarṇṇarupaṃ hūṁbhavaṃ | prathamaṃ vāmabhuje narakapālānāṃ raktena pūritaṃ prathamaṃ | dakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ | śeṣadvibhujābhyāṃ prajñāliṅgitaḥ |
vajravarāhī prajñā bhagavanarūpiṇī |

ṣaḍbhujaṃ | trimukhaṃ | vāmaṃ raktaṃ | dakṣiṇaṃ candrāruṇābhaṃ | prathamaṃ nīlaṃ nagnaḥ | pūrvvoktavarṇṇarūpaṃ bhujābhyāṃ prajñāviśuddhiḥ | prathamavāmabhuje tri
śūlaṃ | prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ | vāmadvitīyabhuje ghaṇṭāṃ | dakṣiṇadvitīyabhuje karttiḥ | śeṣadvibhuje vajraśṛṅkhalāsapttyā | yadvat bhagavān tadvat prajñā |
savyāvasavye karttikapālaḥ | traidhātukātmakamṛtakākrāntaḥ ||
devatāpaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || ||

devatābhiṣekapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
svahṛdi svabījaṃ niścārya
kṛṣṇadīptikayāṅkuśākārayā traidhātukasthitān buddhān ākṛṣya aṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjyānunāthyate | oṁ | abhisiñcayantu māṃ sarvvatathāgatā iti |

tair buddhai
herukarūpaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtapañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ | kalasaiḥ pañcabhir abhisicyamānaḥ | puṣpavṛṣṭir bhavati | dundubhiśabdo bhavati | kuṅkumavṛṣṭir bhavati |

rūpava
jrādibhiḥ pūjyate | vajragītyā locanādibhiḥ sthayate | abhiṣicyamāno mūrdhāyāṃ svakuleso bhavati | etena herukaniṣpannaḥ | trisandhyādhiṣṭhānabhāvanā bhāvyotti
ṣṭhet | devamūrttyā sthātavyaṃ ||
abhiṣekapaṭalaṃ caturthaḥ || ||

atha tatvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
nāsti rūpaṃ na draṣṭā ca na śabdo nāpi śrotāraḥ |
na gandho nāpi
ghrātā ca | na raso nāpi rāsakaḥ |
na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca | na cittaṃ nāpi caittikaṃ |

lg.l: jananīṃ bhaginīṃ caiva pūjayet yogavit sadā |
naṭī rajakī tathā vajrī cāṇḍālī brāhmaṇī tathā |
sevitavyāḥ prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate |
vajra padma tathā karmma tathāgata ratnam eva ca |

vajraṃ ḍombī bhaven mu
drā | padma narttī tathaiva ca |
karmma rajakī sadākhyātā | brāhmaṇī ca tathāgatā |
tathatāyā gataḥ śrīmān | āgataś ca tathaiva ca |
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā
kulyate gaṇyate aneneti kulam ity abhidhīyate |

nāsti bhāvo nābhāvo sti mantraṃ nāsti
na devatā |
brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ sarvve vibuddhas tatvam ucyate |

brahmā nirvṛtti
to buddhaḥ viśanāt viṣṇur ucyate |
śivaṃ sadā sukalyāṇāt sarvva sarvvātmani sthite |
satasukhatvena tatvañ ca vibuddho bodhanād rateḥ |

jananīti bhaṇyate |
prajñā janayati yasmāj jagajjanaṃ |
bhaginīti tathā prajñā vibhāgaṃ darśayed yataḥ |
rajakīti ca duhitā | narttakīti ca prakathyate |
guṇasya duhanāt prajñā duhitā ca nigadyate |
sparśā bhagavatī yasmāt tasmād ḍombī prakalpyate |
maṇḍala pādalekha syān maṇḍalanānān maṇḍalam ucyate |

tad dheyaṃ cinti
taṃ yac ca dheyaṃ yasmād vicintanam |
pitari prāpytaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhuñjate svayaṃ |
maraṇaṃ yena sausukhyena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate ||

div.p: tatvapaṭala pañcamaḥ || ||

lg.l: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi caryāṃ pāragatāṃ varāṃ |
kaṭyāṃ mekhalañ caiva pādayor nnūpuraṃ tathā
ekavṛkṣe śmaśāne vā bhāvanā kathyate śubhā

mātṛgṛhe
tathā rātrau athavā vijane prāntare |
kiñcid uṣme tu prāpte caryāṃ karttuṃ yadīṣyate
siddhiṃ gantuṃ yadīcchāsti caryā tena yāvac caret |
vajrakanyām imāṃ gṛhya caryāṃ karttun tu budhyate |

div.p:
vajrakulābhāvāt | sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ kulena kriyate | athavā anyakulodbhavāṃ | bodhibījanikṣe
peṇa saṃskṛtāṃ gṛhya |

lg.l: yadi gītaṃ gīyate ānandāt tarhi vajrānvitaṃ paraṃ |

tarhi vajrapadair nnāṭyaṃ kurute yogī samā
hitaḥ |

l.add: mantraśuddhyā sthitā gīnātā narttanā bhāvanā kṛtā
tasmād gītañ ca nāṭyañ ca kurute yogī sadā sadā

lg.l:
bhakṣitavyan tu
bhaiṣajyaṃ pātavyaṃ vāri nityatāṃ |
jarāmṛtyau na bādhet rakṣābhūtaḥ sadā bhavet |
bhasma keśapavitrañ ca yogī bibhartti caryayā |
lobhaṃ mohaṃ bhayaṃ krodhaṃ vrīḍāṃ kāryañ ca varjjayet |

nidrām ātmānam utsṛjya caryā kṛyate na
saṃśayaḥ
śarīraṃ dānaṃ dattvā paścāc caryāṃ samārabhet |
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ yathā prāptaṃ tu bhakṣyayet |

graham atra na ka
rttavyaṃ | iṣṭāniṣṭavikalpataḥ |
bhakṣābhakṣaṃ vicāran tu peyāpeyaṃ tathaiva ca |
gamyāgamya tathā mantrī vikalpaṃ naiva kārayet |

siddhilabdho pi yaḥ śiṣyaḥ samyakjñānā
vabhāsakaḥ |
śakratulyo pi yo daityaḥ purato bhavati niścitaṃ |
bhayaṃ tatra na kurvvīta siṅgharūpeṇa paryaṭet |

div.p: caryāpaṭala ṣaṣṭḥaḥ || ||

atha cchommāpaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
yena jñāyate bhrātā |
bhagniṃ cāpi na saṃśayaḥ |

lg.l: ekāṅguliṃ darśayed yas tu dvābhyāṃ susvāgato bhavet |

anāmikān tu yo dadyād dadyāt tasya kani
ṣṭhakāṃ |
madhyamāṃ darśayed yas tu dadyāt tasya pradeśikām |
anāmikāṃ darśayed yas tu grīvāṃ tasya pradarśayet |
paṭaṃ darśayed yasya triśūlaṃ tasya pradarśayet |

stanaṃ darśayed ya
s tu sīmāṃ tasyāḥ pradarśayet

l.add: medinīṃ darśayed yas tu cakraṃ tasyāḥ pradarśayet

lg.l: bhṛkuṭīṃ darśayed yas tu śikhāmokṣo bhidhīyate |
lalāṭaṃ darśayed yas tu pṛṣṭhaṃ tasya pradarśayet |
pādatalaṃ darśayed yas tu krīḍate nandukena tu
vadanti yoginī tatra aho putra mahākṛpa |
yadi mālāhastaṃ darśayanti militavyam iti kathayanti |

mālābhiḥ preṣitāṃ kṛtvā samaye tiṣṭha su
vrate |
tatra melāyāṃ yad yad vadanti yoginyaḥ tat sarvvaṃ karttavyaṃ |

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te melāpakasthānāḥ bhagavān āha |
pīṭhañ copapīṭha
ñ ca kṣetropakṣetram eva ca
cchandohaṃ copacchandohaṃ melāpakopamelāpakan tathā

lg.l: pīlavopapīlavaṃ tathaiva | smaśānopaśmaśānañ cam eva ca | etā dvādasa bhūmayaḥ |

daśabhūmīśvaro nāthaḥ
ebhir anyair na kathyate |

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te pīṭhādayaḥ |
pīṭhañ jālandharaṃ khyātam odyānan tathaiva ca |
pīṭhaṃ porṇṇagiriñ caiva | kāmarūpaṃ tathaiva ca |

lg.l:
upapīṭhaṃ māla
vaṃ proktaṃ sindhur nnagaram eva ca |

upakṣetraṃ kulatā
proktām arbbudañ ca tathaiva ca |

lampāka kāñcikañ caiva saurāṣṭraṃ tathai
va ca |

caritraṃ ko
śalañ caiva vindhyā kaumārapaurikā |

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te divasāḥ |
pretapakṣe caturddaśyām | aṣṭamyān tathaiva ca |

lg.l:
dhvajaṃ
śastrahatañ caiva saptāvarttañ ca khādyate |
kṛpām utpādya yatnena māraṇaṃ krīyate budaḥ
kṛpāhīnā na sidhyanti tasmāt karuṇām upāryayet |

duṣṭāvatāraṇe sarvvaṃ vidhi mukhyā
t pratisidhyate ||

div.p:
tatra evaṃ mantavyaṃ
dinas tu bhagavān vajrī | naktaṃ prajñā prakalpyate |

lg.l: nākāryam vidyate kiñcit nābhakṣaṃ vidyate sadā |

nācintyaṃ vidyate hy atra nāvā
cyaṃ yac chubhāśubhaṃ |
yathā ātmani tathā satvaḥ tathātmani ahaṃ paraṃ |

yāvanto aṅgavikṣepāḥ | vacasaḥ prasa
rāṇi ca |
rukārāpagataṃ vyūhaṃ | ka iti na kvacit sthitaṃ |
te te satvāḥ vasaṃ yānti vajrakapālayogataḥ ||

div.p: cchommāpīṭhanirṇṇayapaṭalaḥ saptamaḥ || ||

khadhātau bhagaṃ vā...dhyātvā madhye kurvvīta bhāvanāṃ |
cakraṃ pūrvvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ devatānāṃ yathodayaṃ |
